title: Read Me And Laugh: A Funny Poem For Every Day Of The Year
description: From the back cover:“ 'Read Me And Laugh' contains a funny poem for every day of the year from the very best modern and classic poets. Some will raise a gentle smile while others will make you roar with laughter, but all should bring a little extra brightness to your day.Includes poems from Allan Ahlberg, Gerard Benson, Valerie Bloom, Lewis Carroll, Charles Causley, Paul Cookson, Roald Dahl, Jan Dean, Peter Dixon, Adrian Henri, Edward Lear, Roger McGough, Wes Magee, Spike Milligan, Ogden Nash, Gareth Owen, Brian Patten, Kit Wright, and many, many more.”
author: Gaby Morgan
